scripts.build:mainnet: pnpm run prepare:mainnet && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:base: pnpm run prepare:base && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:arbitrum: pnpm run prepare:arbitrum && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:optimism: pnpm run prepare:optimism && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:sonic: pnpm run prepare:sonic && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: bash -c 'source ../../.env && pnpm run prepare:arbitrum && graph deploy summer-earn-protocol-rates-arbitrum --version-label $npm_package_version --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key $DEPLOY_KEY --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz'
scripts.deploy:mainnet: bash -c 'source ../../.env && pnpm run prepare:mainnet && graph deploy summer-earn-protocol-rates --version-label $npm_package_version --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy  --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz --deploy-key $DEPLOY_KEY'
scripts.deploy:base: bash -c 'source ../../.env && pnpm run prepare:base && graph deploy summer-earn-protocol-rates-base --version-label $npm_package_version --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key $DEPLOY_KEY --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz'
scripts.deploy:optimism: bash -c 'source ../../.env && pnpm run prepare:optimism && graph deploy summer-earn-protocol-rates-optimism --version-label $npm_package_version --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key $DEPLOY_KEY --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz'
scripts.deploy:sonic: bash -c 'source ../../.env && pnpm run prepare:sonic && graph deploy summer-earn-protocol-rates-sonic --version-label $npm_package_version --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key $DEPLOY_KEY --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz'
scripts.deploy:all: pnpm run deploy:mainnet && pnpm run deploy:arbitrum && pnpm run deploy:base && pnpm run deploy:optimism && pnpm run deploy:sonic
